Header: SAITM Petition Fixed For October Trial
Content: The Writ Petition filed seeking an order questioning the decision of the Sri Lanka Medical Council (SLMC) on the South Asian Institute of Technology and Medicine (SAITM) will be taken into consideration on October 14, Hiru news learns. The decision was made when the petition was taken up for hearing before Court of Appeal (President) Justice Vijith K.Malalgoda and Justice Preethi Padman Surasena this morning (02nd). The petition was filed as the SLMC refused to register a batch of medical students, who had passed out from the SAITM. The case will be heard again on October 14.
